channel.title: CVE Feed for samba -- cifs-utils
channel.description: The latest CVEs for samba -- cifs-utils

item.title: CVE-2020-14342|2024-08-04T12:39:36.529Z -- samba -- cifs-utils
item.description: It was found that cifs-utils' mount.cifs was invoking a shell when requesting the Samba password, which could be used to inject arbitrary commands. An attacker able to invoke mount.cifs with special permission, such as via sudo rules, could use this flaw to escalate their privileges.
